comingSoon.title: Coming soon
comingSoon.stayTuned: Stay tuned for the revolution of financial intelligence with Divizend!

settings.title: Settings

accountSection.title: Account
accountSection.bottomText: To modify your email address and for other profile settings, please visit app.divizend.com.

settings.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

resetProfile.title: Reset profile
resetProfile.message: Are you sure you want to reset your Companion profile? This action cannot be undone.

paywall.reservedForMembers: This section is reserved for members
paywall.pressToStart: Press anywhere to start your membership

languageSelect.title: Choose your language
languageSelect.message: You can change it anytime in settings.

aiDisclaimer.title: AI-Native App Disclaimer
aiDisclaimer.message: First and foremost: This app is AI-native, which means that all information you enter will be processed using OpenAI APIs. By continuing to use this app, you agree to these terms.

taxResidency.title: Which country are you from?
taxResidency.message: More specifically, your country of tax residency.

birthday.title: When were you born?
birthday.message: Please enter your date of birth.

freeTrial.title: Start your journey with a free trial

allSet.title: You're all set!
allSet.message: Thank you for completing the setup. You're now ready to start using the Companion!

learn.title: Visionary
learn.vision: The Visionary is the module of the Companion which wants to make you learn how to turn your desires, goals, visions and dreams into reality.

insights.title: Step 1: Insights
insights.explanation: All this learning is fully personalized and happens at a pace that you choose yourself. To achieve this, you need to answer a few questions first, guided by the following. As a first step, your answers will be reformulated into insights about your financial life.
insights.explanation2: When you tap on a question, you can also generate new questions based on it.

defaultQuestions.question: What are your financial goals, dreams and aspirations?
What is your current financial situation?
Why do you want to learn more about finance?
How do financial topics currently make you feel?
What do you already know about finance?
Which values guide your financial decision-making?
Which financial topics are you interested in?
What do you need to feel financially secure?
In which areas of your financial life do you want to be more independent?
Which financial habits do you want to cultivate?

insightsOnboarding.title: Insights about your financial life
insightsOnboarding.bottomText: Your answers have been reformulated into clear statements about your financial life, which will be used to customize your learning experience. Of course you can also always add and remove insights later.

insights.title: Insights about you
insights.bottomText: These are the insights about you that will be used as context for all goals. Make sure to always keep them up to date.

insights.confirmButton: Happy with these insights? Then let's confirm and continue!

removeInsight.message: Are you sure you want to remove this insight? This action cannot be undone.

goals.title: Step 2: Goals
goals.explanation: Based on the insights about your financial life, let's now determine concrete goals and visions for you. If you want to make a goal more precise or correct it, simply tap on it.
goals.confirmGoals: Goals clear? Then tap here to start realizing them!

realizeGoals.title: Welcome
realizeGoals.explanation: Which of your goals do you want to strive for today?

replaceGoalsAlert.title: Redetermine goals
replaceGoalsAlert.message: Are you sure you want to reinitialize your goals? If you confirm, all current goals within this view will be replaced.

addManualGoal.title: Add a new goal
addManualGoal.placeholder: Formulate it as freely as you like.

removeGoalAlert.message: Are you sure you want to remove this goal and all associated data? This action cannot be undone.

refineGoal.placeholder: What do you want to change about this goal?

secondary.title: Manage subgoals
secondary.explanation: If this goal feels too large for you or you don't know how to start, you can divide it into smaller, manageable subgoals.

generateButton.title: Tap here to divide the selected goal into subgoals

replaceGoalsAlert.title: Redetermine subgoals
replaceGoalsAlert.message: Are you sure you want to reinitialize the subgoals for this goal? If you confirm, all current subgoals within this view will be replaced and all information associated with the current subgoals will be removed. This action cannot be undone.

addManualGoal.title: Add a new subgoal
addManualGoal.placeholder: Formulate it as freely as you like.

removeGoalAlert.message: Are you sure you want to remove this subgoal and all associated data? This action cannot be undone.

refineGoal.placeholder: What do you want to change about this subgoal?

realities.title: Details, context, decisions
realities.addRealityPrompt: What is true about this goal right now? Feel free to also add reasons, explanations and every else you deem relevant.
realities.explanation: These are facts associated with the status quo of your path towards achieving this goal. Make sure to always keep these updated and as accurate as possible.
realities.removeReality: Do you want to remove this fact?
realities.refineReality: What do you want to change about this fact?

assess.title: Add a new fact
assess.explanation: Answer any of the following questions to continue assessing the status quo of your path towards achieving this goal. Or use the button at the bottom to add a new fact manually.

learningIntentions.title: Learning
learningIntentions.explanation: These are topics you can learn about to achieve this goal more effectively. Tap on any of them to open the corresponding question in a chat.
learningIntentions.removeIntention: Do you want to remove this learning goal?

clear.title: Clear all learning goals
clear.message: Are you sure you want to remove all these learning goals? This action cannot be undone.

unlimitedAccess.title: You have free privileged access to the Companion membership
unlimitedAccess.subtitle: This access was granted by administrators

freeTrial.ends: Your free trial will end on {{date,dayLongAndTime}}
freeTrial.after: Your access will be limited afterwards.

paywallDisclaimer.title: Your membership is inactive
paywallDisclaimer.message: Please make sure your membership is active to continue using the app.

waitlist.title: You are in the waiting list for {{name}}.
waitlist.ready: You can now join to Companion for a reduced price.
waitlist.waiting: You are yet to be selected to get the sponsorship.
waitlist.notification: We will notify you by email when you're ready to purchase a membership.

explainer.title: Empower access for everyone
explainer.description: As Companion shall enable users to pursue financial freedom, Divizend uses a solidarity-based pricing model.

pricingOptions.title: Why do we have different pricing options?
pricingOptions.content: We believe in community-driven support. Not everyone can afford the standard membership. By offering higher-factor options, you help subsidize the cost for others who might only pay as little as €0.99.

factorMeaning.title: What does it mean to choose a different factor option?

higherFactor.title: If you choose a higher factor option:
higherFactor.bullet: You're directly contributing to the community by subsidizing the cost for others who might not otherwise afford it.

lowerFactor.title: If you choose a lower factor option:
lowerFactor.bullet: It means you're part of a community that values inclusion and wants you here, regardless of financial barriers.

allCases.title: In all cases:
allCases.bullet: No matter which pricing option you choose, you always get exactly the same features.

plans.title: Choose the appropriate membership option for you
plans.positionDisclaimer: Continuing with another membership option might result in abandoning your position in the waiting list.

sponsored.title: You don't have access to sponsored memberships
sponsored.description: You cannot purchase a sponsored option when you already have an active membership.

disclaimer.title: How does it work?
disclaimer.description: Whether you're sponsoring others or benefiting from a sponsored membership, here's how the solidarity system works:

sponsors.title: If you choose higher factor options:
sponsors.bullet1: Factor 1.5: Creates 1 spot on the waiting list
sponsors.bullet2: Factor 2: Creates 2 spots on the waiting list
sponsors.bullet3: Each spot allows a user to purchase memberships for €10. Members paying €0.99 require 2 spots.

sponsored.title: If you're subscribing to a sponsored membership (€10 or €0.99):
sponsored.bullet1: Your membership depends on available spots created by sponsors
sponsored.bullet2: Matching is anonymous and based on a first-come, first-served system

content.bullet1: If there are spots available, you are able to instantly activate your membership
content.bullet2: If no spots are available, users join a waiting list
content.bullet3: Once a spot is available, you'll receive an email notification and have 1 week to activate your membership. After that, the spot is forfeited

content.bullet1: Solidarity Members (€10 or €0.99): If you start subscribing without spots being reserved for you but cancel, your spot is held for 5 minutes
content.bullet2: Sponsors (€30 or €40): If you cancel, the sponsored user keeps their reduced price until they cancel
content.bullet3: Purchasing any other membership while on the waiting list means you'll lose your spot

confirmation.title: Your purchase is confirmed
confirmation.thankYou: Thank you for choosing to be part of our community!
confirmation.activationMessage: Your membership has been successfully activated, and we're excited to have you on board.

helpSection.title: Need Help or Have Questions?
helpSection.message: We're here for you every step of the way! If you have questions, concerns, or need guidance, don't hesitate to reach out. Our support team is ready to assist you at

waitlist.title: You're on the waiting list
waitlist.description: You have chosen a sponsored membership option. Currently, there are no available spots, but you've been added to our waiting list.

spotMatching.title: 1. Spot matching:
spotMatching.point1: As soon as a spot becomes available, we'll reserve it for you.
spotMatching.point2: Matching is done anonymously and on a first-come, first-served basis.

notification.title: 2. Notification:
notification.point1: You'll receive an email notification when a spot is reserved for you.
notification.point2: After receiving the notification, you'll have 7 days to activate your membership.

forfeiting.title: 3. Forfeiting spots:
forfeiting.point1: If you don't activate within 7 days, the spot will be forfeited, and you'll remain on the waiting list.

alerts.title: Are you sure?
alerts.removed: If you proceed, you will be removed from the waiting list
alerts.bottomWaitlist: If you proceed, you will be placed at the bottom of the waiting list
alerts.losePosition: If you proceed, you will renounce your spot in the waiting list for the lower factor membership

trialPeriod.free: Get access for one week completely free.
trialPeriod.after: You will only be charged if you purchase a new membership.

country.gs: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
country.sh: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

portfolioConnect.title: Portfolio connect

confirmCancel.title: Confirm closing portfolio import dialog?
confirmCancel.description: If you close this dialog, but have already chosen your bank and entered all required credentials, this portfolio import will continue running in the background and you can view its progress and finalize it in the settings. Otherwise your progress will be reset. It is recommended to leave this dialog open until the import is finished. Click on 'OK' if you still want to close this dialog.

bankLogin.title: Connect portfolio
bankLogin.newTabInfo: A new tab should have opened where you can connect your bank to Divizend.
bankLogin.clickToOpen: If this is not the case, please click here.
bankLogin.waitingForAggregation: You have successfully connected your portfolio and it is now being scanned. Please wait a moment.

bankDepotDetails.title: Bank and depot details
bankDepotDetails.description: Please enter the following information about your bank and securities account.

chooseDepots.title: Choose portfolios
chooseDepots.description: Please select the portfolios you want to import to Divizend:

chooseDepotToSync.title: Choose portfolio to synchronize
chooseDepotToSync.description: Please select the portfolio you want to use for the synchronization:
chooseDepotToSync.infoNote: We noticed a mismatch between your current portfolio number and the one(s) you are trying to use for synchronization.

confirmIncompleteImport.title: Confirm incomplete import
confirmIncompleteImport.description: Some of your portfolio's securities still need further information so that they can be imported. If you would still like to proceed, the following highlighted incomplete securities will not be imported:
confirmIncompleteImport.descriptionCompleteWhenRemovingTx: The following stocks have only an incomplete or inconsistent transaction history. If you want to proceed, only their transactions will be removed, but all other information about these stocks will be imported as usual:

importBlocked.noSecuritiesExist: Please add shares to this securities account with the + symbol on the left hand side.
importBlocked.noSecuritiesComplete: Please complete the data of the shares highlighted on the left hand side.

background.title: You can now close this dialog now
background.description: The import is running in the background, so you are free to close this import dialog.

finalize.title: Continue
finalize.heading: Import successful! How shall we go on?
finalize.subheadingNotDone: However, some details about your securities and dividends are still missing. Please click on "Edit portfolio" to fix this.
finalize.multiAccountFilter: Please click on "OK" below now to assign all imported portfolios to the respective customers of your organization.

portfolioConnect.selectSecapiImportId: Select the SecAPI import ID to import its content!

deletePortfolio.title: Delete portfolio
deletePortfolio.description: Are you sure you want to delete this portfolio?

onBoarding.title: Manage Multiple Portfolios
onBoarding.description: View and add portfolios for free, regardless of your bank.

onBoarding.title: Seamless Integration
onBoarding.description: Enjoy high-quality service with automatic coverage for most banks.

onBoarding.title: Secure & Private
onBoarding.description: Login safely with no data stored for your privacy.
